title: Hezekiah’s Righteous Reign Begins
summary: Hezekiah becomes king of Judah and removes idols, including the bronze serpent. He trusts in the Lord and is successful. However, Assyria invades and threatens Jerusalem, mocking God and trying to weaken Judah’s trust in Him.

faq.question: What reforms did Hezekiah make?
faq.answer: He removed high places, smashed sacred stones, and trusted God more than any king before or after.

faq.question: What challenge did Hezekiah face?
faq.answer: The powerful Assyrian empire invaded and mocked the God of Israel.
